title: Car Nicobarese - Genesis Portion
description: Car Nicobarese translation of the first four chapters of Genesis published by the Bible Society of India. Car is the most widely spoken of the Nicobarese languages spoken in the Nicobar Islands of India. Although related distantly to Vietnamese and Khmer, it is typologically much more akin to nearby Austronesian languages such as Nias and Acehnese, with which it forms a linguistic area.
